title: How a worm could save humanity from bad AI | Ramin Hasani
description: What if AI could think and adapt like a real brain? TED Fellow and AI scientist Ramin Hasani shares how liquid neural networks — a new, more flexible AI technology inspired by physics and living brains — could transform how we solve complex problems.
author: Ramin Hasani
